title: OMG YOU NEED TO READ THIS
body: Turn ranked queues back on %%%s, I'm bored.

replies.body: Ranked queues are currently turned off because of an issue that is causing some players to be unable to connect to games - once that issue is resolved, we'll re-enable these queues.
Yeah ik i lost promos coz of it.. Lol idc about that though can you tell me roughly how long it will take?

> [{quoted}](name=TooManyValiums,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=mrjoAUyP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-17T12:41:45.615+0000)
>
> Yeah ik i lost promos coz of it.. Lol idc about that though can you tell me roughly how long it will take?

We're [updating in the announcement thread ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/RF70PdWb-game-start-game-disconnect-issues-17032016)- we're working on a solution that should help people who were impacted before right now.
